text: Can someone help me add a custom workflow to update CRM records in a public app for a marketplace release?

Sounds pretty straight forward which parts are you having trouble with?

To get the desired outcome of showing all contacts associated with the event object, i think you would have the easiest way around this, make the event card render an association table with the filters setup as you described here, going to a filtered contact view would probably not be as dynamic as just having your card render the table?
